front.title: A YANG Data Model for RESTCONF Clients and Servers

abstract.t: This document presents two YANG modules, one module to configure a RESTCONF client and the other module to configure a RESTCONF server. These modules support both standard and call home RESTCONF connections. For initiating connections, both modules configure HTTPS. For listening for connections, both modules configure HTTPS and HTTP. Whilst RESTCONF supports only HTTPS, HTTP may be configured for when a TLS-terminator is deployed in front of the listener.
